channel.title: Classicpkzz........now online again..........classicpkzzz
channel.description:
OUTTA THE BETA STAGE
We have mini games and even more are being added, gambling mini game has been added. events, new NPC's, new armour, new suits are being added.much more this is rsc unleashed changed the name This is a 24/7 server with great admins.and have put alot of time into the game. the exp rates currently at about 75x in this new server! I will post some pictures of the server below. Hope to see everyone there!
This is the classicpkzz, This server is hosted on a Dedicated Server. We guarantee you will like it. This server is made by me and yong min We will be updating frequently This source is based on easyrsc atm. This is a pking server that you will like its Sure free for all ( no donations only if u want to i am not going to ask ) if you want help you can pm mods or admins its a long term server so its not waste of your time !:) We update our server almost every day with new exciting features to be discorverd! And since we are still a bit new, it isn't that hard to work your way on up to the #1 overall rank! classicpkzz is a small community with a great server & still growing in activity. Drop rates for meds/sqs are decent - no more fucked economy. Rune is fairly easy, however.
EVERYTHING IN MY SIG
GO AHEAD AND FLAME AWAY LOL IDC
[img]http://bl112w.blu112.mail.live.com/att/GetAttachment.aspx?tnail=0&messageId=ca510195-71f9-448e-b025-50689732b9df&Aux=0|0|8CBB84A9B280AB0|[/img]
[img]http://bl112w.blu112.mail.live.com/att/GetAttachment.aspx?tnail=1&messageId=ca510195-71f9-448e-b025-50689732b9df&Aux=0|0|8CBB84A9B280AB0|[/img]
[img]http://bl112w.blu112.mail.live.com/att/GetAttachment.aspx?tnail=2&messageId=ca510195-71f9-448e-b025-50689732b9df&Aux=0|0|8CBB84A9B280AB0|[/img]
[img]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/dragsq.jpg[/img]
bam mini lols [img]http://i201.photobucket.com/albums/aa245/pkrwitprayer/waveminigame.jpg[/img]
